attributes.action: Hold a full judicial enquiry into the Scottish Parliamentary elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the report by Ron Gould in to the Scottish election fiasco, we the public are unconvinced by the governments proposed response and petition the Prime Minister to instigate a full and free judicial enquiry into the events and decisions leading up to the election. The allegations that the Scotland Office took decisions for partisan advantage are simply too grave for there not to be an independent judicial enquiry in order to maintain the public's belief in democracy and the political process.
